headline.main: Three Courses Seen for Us in Move for Peace

lead_paragraph: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: After Russia's heroic resistance and the repeal of the Neutrality Act provisions it has become certain that the Allies will win the war. But it still remains very doubtful if they will win the peace or lose it again as in 1919.
abstract: lr urging U S-Brit children correspondence to obtain better understanding of roles
snippet: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: After Russia's heroic resistance and the repeal of the Neutrality Act provisions it has become certain that the Allies will win the war. But it still remains very doubtful if they will win the peace or lose it ...

byline.original: COUNT R.N. COUDENHOVE-KALERGI, President of the Pan-Europa Union
